title: Drawing, "The Salon in the Montpensier Wing, Palais Royal", ca. 1831
medium: Brush and watercolor, white gouache over graphite on tan wove paper
inscribed: Lower center in margin: Petit Salon de l'appartement de l'aile de Montpensier
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection;  Galerie Jacques Fischer, Paris
dimensions:
Frame H x W x D: 50.2 x 39.7 x 2.5 cm (19 3/4 in. x 15 5/8 in. x 1 in.)
Sheet: 16.5 x 23 cm (6 1/2 x 9 1/16 in.)
description: This view of the long Salon shows a highly polished parquet floor, a symmetrical formal arrangement of neoclassical furniture, and a parade of crystal chandeliers and wall lights. The chimneypiece appears to be decorated with ormolu motifs of the period.

exhibitions.title: House Proud: 19th Century Watercolor Interiors from the Thaw Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Salon in the Montpensier Wing, Palais Royal", ca. 1831.
ca. 1831. Brush and watercolor, white gouache over graphite on tan wove paper. Thaw Collection. 2007-27-11.
